headline: Reassessing Dollar General (DG) Valuation After Its 76% Year-to-Date Share Price Rebound
summary: Why Dollar General Stock Has Been Catching Investors Attention Dollar General (DG) has quietly staged a strong comeback, with the stock climbing around 28% over the past month and roughly 76% year to date, prompting fresh interest in its valuation. See our latest analysis for Dollar General. The recent surge has been driven less by flashy headlines and more by a reset in expectations, with a 30 day share price return of 27.72% helping rebuild confidence despite a still weak five year total...

headline: Kroger CEO flags alarming shift in how customers shop
summary: People need to eat, but what they eat depends a lot on their budget. Executives from lower-priced chains, including McDonald's and Dollar General, have commented on how they are seeing sales growth with higher-income customers. "We're pleased to see growth once again in our total customer count, ...
